column5: Good thing you qualified your title ... I was gonna say there was never anything normal about you  Glad you're feeling better Dawg!  Maureen
Yeah, I was thinking that too. Normal compared to what? Glad you're feeling better Bubba.

Far as I 'm concerned the last few days in Chat I didn't see you lose one bit of your personality.I know you haven't touch any booze though.  Your crazy sick and crazy well .I think you just like flirting with the nurses  you must of caught some kind of cat fish slime disease.
I think the blood was just confused and attacking good ol Glen for being himself... that or as you said mike, he likes flirtin with the nurses Glad to hear your better Glen
Yo Dawg great to hear.  Now get out and catch some fish.
Good to hear Dawg... glad your feeling better...
Glad to hear you are feeling almost normal.It really sucks when you are hurting.Take care and get out fishing.
right on glen! what are you waiting for? get on the water!
Great to see you better Glen..
once his blood sobered up he was fine....  Art
Good to hear yer over all that mess.  Sounded like some pretty nasty stuff there.
Good to hear you are better....  I'm now on antibiotics for upper respiratory issues....LOL.
Clliff.. tell bly to take the plastic bag off your head... you can breath easier that way! Experience talking here!  Good to hear you're ready to go fishin again Glen !!
Glad ypu are feeling better glen !!!!   just in time for xmas too !!!!.  ..take care and get back out there and catch us some of those big,slab crallies !!!! go get em tiger..LOL..LOL..LOL.  cheers
